document_data.name: ''Chest of Preserving''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''chest of preserving''''' was a [[magic item|magical]] chest that prevented its contents from rotting or decaying.
document_data.Description: A typical ''chest of preserving'' had a half-barrel lid and was {{SI|2.5|ft|c|long=yes}} long, {{SI|1.5|ft|c|long=yes}} wide, and {{SI|1|ft|c|long=yes}} tall. Its interior was divided into compartments for storage. It could be closed with a non-magical lock, which, if destroyed, rendered the entire chest non-magical.
document_data.Powers: Food, drink, and any perishable items placed inside a ''chest of preserving'' did not age or decay.
document_data.Notable Owners: The [[wizard]] [[Muiral]] owned a ''chest of preserving'', which he kept in the [[Muiral's Gauntlet]] level of [[Undermountain]].
